_header: While was Saint Peter I-cleped Simon
_description: Against simony — eighteen couplets, or stanzas of 4-6 lines monorhymed

OxfJesus29.First Lines:
Hwile wes seynte peter i cleped symonþo queþ vre louerd
                    him to þu schalt hoten ston…
OxfJesus29.Last Lines:
…For his swete moder luue þat is so veyr and
                    swoteÞat we in þisse lyue hit i seon mote
OxfJesus29.Note:
Robbins (1975)
